name: Admin's MFA: Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if MFA for admins is enabled

name: Mixed Duties Applied To Admins
description: This metric is used to assess if Mixed Duties is applied appropriately

name: Anomaly Detection: Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if Anomaly Detection is enabled

name: Anomaly Detection: Output
description: This metric is used to assess if the output (results) of the anomaly detection is valid

name: Anonymous Authentication
description: This metric is used to assess if it is possible to authenticate anonymously

name: Code Commits: Approved Author
description: This metric is used to assess if committed code is from approved authors

name: Storage Encryption: Algorithm
description: This metric is used to assess the algorithm of a storage encryption block cipher

name: Storage Encryption: Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if storage encryption is enabled

name: Automatic Updates: Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if automatic updates are enabled

name: Automatic Updates: Interval
description: This metric is used to assess if automatic updates are performed with sufficient frequency (days)

name: Automatic Updates: Security Only
description: This metric is used to assess if only security updates are performed

name: Boot Logging: Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if boot logs are enabled

name: Boot Logging: Output
description: This metric is used to assess the output destination of boot logs

name: Boot Logging: Retention
description: This metric is used to assess the configured log retention (days)

name: Code Commits: Requires Sign-Off
description: This metric is used to assess if Git commit messages contain a signoff

name: Storage Encryption: Customer Key Encryption
description: This metric is used to assess if encryption is done via customer keys

name: CSAF Requirement 1: Valid CSAF document
description: This metric checks Requirement 1 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#711-requirement-1-valid-csaf-document

name: CSAF Requirement 2: Valid CSAF document filename
description: This metric checks Requirement 2 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#712-requirement-2-filename

name: CSAF Requirement 3: TLS
description: This metric checks Requirement 3 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#713-requirement-3-tls

name: CSAF Requirement 4: TLP:WHITE
description: This metric checks Requirement 4 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#714-requirement-4-tlpwhite

name: CSAF Requirement 5: TLP:RED and TLP:AMBER
description: This metric checks Requirement 5 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#715-requirement-5-tlpamber-and-tlpred

name: CSAF Requirement 6: No redirects
description: This metric checks Requirement 6 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#716-requirement-6-no-redirects

name: CSAF Requirement 7-10: provider-metadata.json
description: This metric checks Requirement 7-10 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#717-requirement-7-provider-metadatajson and the following sections.

name: CSAF Requirement 11: One folder per year
description: This metric checks Requirement 11 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#7111-requirement-11-one-folder-per-year

name: CSAF Requirement 18: Integrity
description: This metric checks Requirement 18 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#7118-requirement-18-integrity

name: CSAF Requirement 19: Signatures
description: This metric checks Requirement 19 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#7119-requirement-19-signatures

name: CSAF Requirement 20: Public OpenPGP Key
description: This metric checks Requirement 20 of the CSAF standard. See https://docs.oasis-open.org/csaf/csaf/v2.0/os/csaf-v2.0-os.html#7120-requirement-20-public-openpgp-key

name: Identity: Password Policy
description: This metric is used to assess if a password policy is in place

name: Identity: Recent Activity
description: This metric is used to assess if a user is still active (days)

name: L3 Firewall: Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if a L3 firewall is in place

name: L3 Firewall: Restricted Ports
description: This metric is used to assess the restricted ports of a L3 firewall

name: Malware Protection: Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if Malware Protection is enabled

name: Malware Protection: Output
description: This metric is used to assess to which service the Malware Protection results are sent

name: Mutual Authentication
description: This metric is used to assess if mutual authentication, including client certificate, has been enabled

name: Object Storage: Public Access Disabled
description: This metric is used to assess if public acess is disabled for a object storage

name: OS Logging: Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if OS logging is enabled

name: OS Logging: Output
description: This metric is used to assess to which service the OS logs are sent

name: OS Logging: Retention
description: This metric is used to assess the configured OS log retention (days)

name: Resource Inventory
description: This metric is used to assess if an inventory is set up for resources

name: Role Broad Assignments
description: This metric is used to assess the broad assignments of roles

name: Runtime Version
description: This metric is used to assess the runtime version of a given programming language

name: Code Commits: Requires Signed Sign-Off
description: This metric is used to assess if Git commit messages are signed and contain a signoff

name: Code Commits: Requires Signed Commits
description: This metric is used to assess if Git commit messages are signed

name: Single Sign On Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if SSO is enabled

name: TLS Cipher Suites
description: This metric is used to assess if an up-to-date TLS cipher suite is used

name: TLS Diffie-Hellman Groups
description: This metric is used to assess if an up-to-date TLS Diffie-Hellman group is used

name: TLS Signature Algorithms
description: This metric is used to assess if an up-to-date TLS signature algorithm is used

name: Transport Encryption Protocol
description: This metric is used to assess if an up-to-date transport encryption protocol is used

name: Transport Encryption: Enabled
description: This metric is used if transport encryption is enabled

name: Transport Encryption: Enforced
description: This metric is used to assess if transport encryption is enforced

name: Web Application Firewall: Enabled
description: This metric is used to assess if Web Application Firewall is enabled

name: Library: No known vulnerabilities
description: This metric is used to assess if a library contains no known vulnerabilities
